concept.title: Steps to create a REST API
concept.shortdesc: Here's an outline of the steps we'll follow to create our REST API.

conbody.p: To create our application, we will need two Ubos services:

ul.li: Node-RED for building our back-end application using visual blocks
MongoDB for storing and manipulating data

conbody.p: To build a simple REST API from scratch, we will first set up our working environment, create the services, and connect them. Then, we will develop the functionality of each CRUD operation: create, read, update, and delete.
